description:
Teach Kids English is an ESL Course for English teachers and the parents of bilingual children who would like their children to be fluent in English.

Would you like some practical information on how your children can enjoy learning English, as well as some high quality resources to keep them engaged while they learn?

By the end of this course you will not only have learnt how to teach your children English through classroom learning, but also through natural learning in everyday situations.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

IMPORTANT POINT 1:

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

This brand new course is aimed at:

- Parents who do not have English as their mother tongue, but have a good working knowledge of the language and would like to teach their children to become fluent in English.

- Parents of bilingual children, where one of the parents is an English-speaking ex-pat living abroad, who want to ensure their children's English is at the level of a native speaker.

- Teachers of pupils learning English as a Second Language, who would like high quality ESL Worksheets and Lesson plans, as well as ideas and resources for their students' extra curricular learning.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

IMPORTANT POINT 2:

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Included with this course are high quality ESL worksheets and lesson plans, to help make classroom learning as interesting for the children as possible. There are worksheets available for different levels of English acquisition and different age groups.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++

As well as being an ESL instructor, I am also the proud father of two bilingual girls and a bilingual boy and have been successfully employing the practical techniques that you are about to learn in this course for the last 10 years.

Be sure to check out the FREE preview videos and I hope to see you on the inside. I am excited to get the chance to share the secrets I have learnt and help you to teach your kids English.
title: Teach Kids English - ESL Course
